MACLib (MSVC)

Download

  • Download http://files.monkeysaudio.com/MAC_SDK_411.zip

Adaptation

  • in %SOURCE_HOME%/Shared/All.h (I don't want to use Assembly): 
    #define ENABLE_ASSEMBLY
    --> 
    //#define ENABLE_ASSEMBLY
  • in %SOURCE_HOME%/Shared/All.h (problems to compile, and I don't care of this for my needs): 
    #define BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY
    ---> 
    //#define BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/Source/MACLib/MACLib.vcproj

Project Options

  • C/C++, Language, wchar_t : Yes

Compile

  • Build Release

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/Shared/*.h to Shared/Include/MACLib/
  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/Shared/MACLib.lib to Shared/Library/BCB/MACLib.lib
